properties.address: Snack and Chat Airedale Library, West Yorkshire WF10 3JJ
properties.description: We run a day session with free refreshments, games, crafts, and hobbies. with this we do offer a 2 course meal for £5.00 if wish to book in. We are looking at a light lunch (soup and a roll ) for £2.50.
properties.title: Airedale fun, friends and laughter

properties.address: Featherstone Community Centre, West Yorkshire WF7 5BB
properties.description: A lunch group that we already run will be available to attend for free refreshments. Games and quizzes available to join in with. Meals can be booked at a charge £5.00 for 2 courses. soup and roll £2.50.
properties.title: Featherstone foodies

properties.address: Kinsley & Fitzwilliam Learning & Community Centre, West Yorkshire WF9 5BP
properties.description: A day session with activities , talks, hobbies, games and community work groups, Veteran centre. Free refreshments with Lunch to a cost for 2 course @£5.00 on booking. £2.50 for soup and a roll
properties.title: Fitzwilliam Centre

properties.address: Pontefract Methodist Church, West Yorkshire WF8 1QG
properties.description: Open to all, 10.00am - 1.30pm each Thursday. Refreshments served throughout with lunch at 12.30pm. Optional ‘pause for thought’ at 12noon.
properties.title: The Warm Room

properties.address: Station Lane, Pontefract, England, WF7 5BB, United Kingdom
properties.description: Free Food/Drink, People to chat to, Wheelchair Accessible, Toilets, Accessible Toilet, Parking, Child Friendly, Computer Access
properties.title: Friends of Featherstone Library

properties.address: The Copper Pipe Cafe The Bridge, Barnby Dun Road, Doncaster, England, DN2 4RG, United Kingdom
properties.description: Free Food/Drink, Free Wi-Fi, Device Charging, Advice, People to chat to, Space to work, Food/Drink for sale
properties.title: The Copper Pipe Cafe (Cambeth Community Project CIV)

properties.accessibility: The venue provides level access for wheel chair users. An accessible toilet is available. There are parking facilities which allow level access to the hall in the adjacent car park in Vicars Court
properties.address: Neighbourhood Elders Team, St Mary the Less , 39 Leeds Road, Allerton Bywater Leeds
